title: navigator: send commands to anyone listening

conversation.author: sfuhrer
conversation.body:
### Solved Problem
 POI commands that are part of a mission do not work when the gimbal is controlled by a companion computer. 

### Solution
Send commands to anyone listening. 

### Test coverage
We have been flying with that change for some years now.

issue_comments.author: sfuhrer
issue_comments.body: @bkueng @ThomasDebrunner you were looking into this before - do you think this change is needed?

reviews.author: bkueng
reviews.body: I don't remember exactly but I think it's still needed.
